# The `raw_svector_ostream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> that writes to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> that writes to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a>.

This is a simple adaptor class. This class does not encounter output errors. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-svector-ostream">raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream</a> operates without a buffer, delegating all memory management to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a>. Thus the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a> is always up-to-date, may be used directly and there is no need to call <a href="#a945fc289b91d41a778681bc1ca63ce39">flush()</a>.

Definition at line 691 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.

Construct a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-svector-ostream">raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream</a>.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="O">The vector to write to; this should generally have at least 128 bytes free to avoid any extraneous memory overhead.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

### reserveExtraSpace() {#a94bec39d1b2d114ce2a7f131314c2254}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream::reserveExtraSpace (uint64&#95;t ExtraSize)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
If possible, pre-allocate <code>ExtraSize</code> bytes for stream data.

i.e. it extends internal buffers to keep additional ExtraSize bytes. So that the stream could keep at least <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1">tell()</a> + ExtraSize bytes without re-allocations. <a href="#a94bec39d1b2d114ce2a7f131314c2254">reserveExtraSpace()</a> does not change the size/data of the stream.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h/#l00723">723</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
